comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: I wonder if this could be related to the Langley Flyer experimental flights over the Potomac. Looks like there is something slightly submerged in the foreground, perhaps a wing structure. www.flickr.com/photos/dcplcommons/3359939497/ If we could get some really high resolution images of this and the plate where the flyer is being loaded on the "houseboat", we may be able to compare the dinghies and the personnel.
